name: waveswap
description: WaveSwap: Privacy-preserving DEX aggregator for Solana with encrypted swaps

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "bun run dev:web" "bun run dev:backend" "bun run dev:docs"
scripts.build:all: bun run build:packages && bun run build:apps
scripts.build:packages: bun run build:ui && bun run build:sdk && bun run build:programs
scripts.build:apps: bun run build:web && bun run build:backend && bun run build:docs
scripts.test:all: bun run test:packages && bun run test:apps
scripts.test:packages: bun run test:ui && bun run test:sdk && bun run test:programs
scripts.test:apps: bun run test:web && bun run test:backend
scripts.lint:all: bun run lint:packages && bun run lint:apps
scripts.lint:packages: bun run lint:ui && bun run lint:sdk && bun run lint:programs
scripts.lint:apps: bun run lint:web && bun run lint:backend && bun run lint:docs
scripts.lint:fix:all: bun run lint:fix:packages && bun run lint:fix:apps
scripts.clean:all: bun run clean:packages && bun run clean:apps && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.clean:packages: bun run clean:ui && bun run clean:sdk && bun run clean:programs
scripts.clean:apps: bun run clean:web && bun run clean:backend && bun run clean:docs
scripts.db:setup: cd apps/backend && bun run prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:generate: cd apps/backend && bun run prisma generate
scripts.db:studio: cd apps/backend && bun run prisma studio
scripts.db:seed: cd apps/backend && bun run prisma db seed
scripts.setup: bun install && bun run build:packages && bun run db:generate

author: WaveSwap Team
